1744919.effect: If this card is Summoned: You can add 1 "Constellar" card or 1 "tellarknight" or "tellarnova" Spell/Trap from your Deck to your hand. You cannot Summon monsters the turn you activate this effect, except "Constellar" and "tellarknight" monsters. You can only use this effect of "Satellarknight Constellar Cassiopeia" once per turn. Once per Chain, during your opponent's turn, you can (Quick Effect): Immediately after this effect resolves, Xyz Summon 1 Xyz Monster, using "Constellar" or "tellarknight" monsters you control as material, including this card.
1744919.name: Satellarknight Constellar Cassiopeia

1744396.effect:
Once per turn, during the End Phase: You can take 1 "Constellar" or "tellarknight" card from your GY, except "Constellarknight", and either add it to your hand or attach it to a "Constellar" or "tellarknight" Xyz Monster you control as material. You can only use each of the following effects of "Constellarknight" once per turn.
● If a monster(s) is Summoned: You can reveal your hand; add 1 "Constellar" or "tellarknight" monster from your Deck to your hand, with a different name from all cards in your hand, face-up field, and GY. 
● If this face-up card leaves the field: You can place 1 Continuous Spell/Trap from your hand face-up in your Spell & Trap Zone.
1744396.name: Constellarknight

1744619.effect:
When you activate this card, you can also discard 1 card; apply 1 of these effects.
● Add 1 "Constellar", "tellarknight", or "tellarnova" card from your Deck to your hand, except "Constellarknight Constellation", or, if you discarded a card when you activated this card, you can add 2 cards with different names, instead.
● Special Summon 1 "Constellar" or "tellarknight" monster from your hand, or up to 2 instead if you discarded a card when you activated this card.
You can only activate 1 "Constellarknight Constellation" per turn. You cannot Special Summon monsters from your Extra Deck the turn you activate this card, except "Constellar" and "tellarknight" monsters.
1744619.name: Constellarknight Constellation

1744401.effect: During the Main Phase: You can Special Summon 1 "Constellar" or "tellarknight" monster from your GY in Defense Position. If a monster(s) is Special Summoned from the Extra Deck: You can Special Summon 1 "Constellar" or "tellarknight" Xyz Monster from your Extra Deck, by using 1 "Constellar" or "tellarknight" Xyz Monster you control as material. (This is treated as an Xyz Summon. Transfer its materials to the Summoned monster.) You can only use each effect of "Constellarnova" once per turn.
1744401.name: Constellarnova

1824123.effect: If you control a "World Reaper" monster: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 "World Reaper" monster you control: Equip 1 "World Reaper" monster from your hand to it. You can only use each effect of "World Reaper Peacekeeper" once per turn. You cannot Special Summon monsters from the Extra Deck, except "World Reaper" monsters.
1824123.name: World Reaper Peacekeeper

1826016.effect: You can target 1 "World Reaper" monster in your GY: Special Summon it in defense position, but its effects are negated. If this card is sent to the GY for the Tribute Summon of a "World Reaper" monster; you can equip this card to a "World Reaper" monster you control. You can only use each effect of "World Reaper Young Lord" once per turn. You cannot Special Summon monster from the Extra Deck, except "World Reaper" monsters.
1826016.name: World Reaper Young Lord

1824117.effect: If you control no monsters: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: Add 1 "World Reaper" card from your Deck to your hand. For the Tribute Summon of a Level 8 "World Reaper" monster, this card can be treated as 2 tributes. You can only use each effect of "World Reaper Swordsman" once per turn. You cannot Special Summon monsters from the Extra Deck, except "World Reaper" monsters.
1824117.name: World Reaper Swordsman

1825911.effect: You cannot Special Summon monsters from the Extra Deck, except "World Reaper" monsters. If this card was Tribute Summoned using "World Reaper" monsters, it gains these effects:●During the Main Phase: You can target 1 Spell/Trap your opponent controls: Equip it to this card.●You can use Equip cards you control as tributes for the Tribute Summon of a "World Reaper" monster.●During your next End Phase after this card was Summoned, if this card is equipped with an opponents Spell/Trap: Add it it to your opponents hand.You can only use each effect of "World Reaper Void Engulfer" once per turn.
1825911.name: World Reaper Void Engulfer

1824289.effect: You cannot Special Summon monsters from the Extra Deck, except "World Reaper" monsters. If this card was Tribute Summoned using "World Reaper" monsters, it gains these effects:●During the Main Phase: You can target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls: Equip it to this card.●You can use Equip cards you control as tributes for the Tribute Summon of a "World Reaper" monster.●During your next End Phase after this card was Summoned, if this card is equipped with an opponents monster, Special Summon it to their field.You can only use each effect of "World Reaper Black Hole" once per turn.
1824289.name: World Reaper Black Hole

1825922.effect: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must first be Special Summoned from your hand or GY by Tributing up to 4 "World Reaper" monsters (min 2). You cannot Special Summon monsters from the Extra Deck, except "World Reaper" monsters. This monster gains effects based on the amount of Tributes used for its summon:●2: You can use Equip cards you control as Tributes for the Tribute Summon of a "World Reaper" monster.●3: If this card destroys an opponents monster by battle: You can equip 1 card your opponent controls to this card.●4: Cannot be destroyed by card effects. You can send 1 equip card you control to the GY, then target 1 card on the field: Banish it.You can only use each effect of "World Reaper Comet Creator" once per turn.
1825922.name: World Reaper Comet Creator

1825852.effect: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must first be Special Summoned from your hand or GY by Tributing up to 4 "World Reaper" monsters (min 2). You cannot Special Summon monsters from the Extra Deck, except "World Reaper" monsters. This monster gains effects based on the amount of Tributes used for its summon:●2: You can use Equip cards you control as Tributes for the Tribute Summon of a "World Reaper" monster.●3: During the Main Phase: You can equip 1 card your opponent controls to this card.●4: Cannot be targeted by card effects. If this card destroys an opponents monster by battle: You can Special Summon 1 monster equipped to this card to your side of the field.You can only use each effect of "World Reaper Galaxy Destroyer" once per turn.
1825852.name: World Reaper Galaxy Destroyer

1826041.effect: Special Summon a Level 4 or lower "World Reaper" monster from your hand or GY, and if you do, it can be treated as 2 Tributes for the Tribute Summon of a "World Reaper" monster. You can banish this card from your GY and return 1 Level 8 or higher "World Reaper" monster from your hand to your Deck: Add a Level 8 or higher "World Reaper" monster from your Deck to your hand, with a different name than the returned monster, but it cannot be summoned this turn. You can only use each effectof "Overlook from the World Reapers" once per turn.
1826041.name: Overlook from the World Reapers

1824397.effect: If this card is activated: Add 1 "World Reaper" monster from your deck to your hand. During your Main Phase, immediately after this effect resolves: Normal Summon 1 "World Reaper" monster. The first time your Tribute Summoned "World Reaper" monster would be destroyed ber turn, it is not. You can only use each effect of "World Reaper Void" once per turn.
1824397.name: World Reaper Void

1825887.effect: You can target 1 "World Reaper" monster you control: It can be treated as 2 Tributes for the Tribute Summon of a "World Reaper" monster this turn. If you Tribute Summon a "World Reaper" monster; you can target 1 card in either GY: Equip it to the Tribute Summoned monster. If your "World Reaper" monster destroys an opponents monster by battle; you can equip the destroyed monster to a "World Reaper" monster you control. You can only use each effect of "World Reaper Gate" once per turn.
1825887.name: World Reaper Gate

1826296.effect: 2 Level 12 "World Reaper" monsters summoned with 3+ TributesYou can detach any number of materials from this card, then target that many cards your opponent controls: Attach them to this card as material. For a Tribute Summon, you can detach materials from this card, equal to the amount of Tributes needed. If this card destroys an opponents monster by battle; attach it to this card as material. You can only use each effect of "World Reaper Divine Judgement" once per turn.
1826296.name: World Reaper Divine Judgement

1238986.effect: During your turn, if you have 3 or more Level 3 monsters in your GY: You can Tribute this card; Special Summon 1 DARK Dragon Xyz monster from your GY and attach this card to it as material. When this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can excavate the top 5 cards of your Deck, then add up to 1 Level 3 monster from among them to your hand or send it to your GY, and shuffle the rest back into your Deck. You can only use this effect of "Cherishing Knight, Branwen" once per turn.
1238986.name: Cherishing Knight, Branwen

1239189.effect: When this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can draw 1 card. If this card was sent from your hand or Deck to the GY: You can Special Summon it in Defense Position. You can only use each effect of "Promising Knight, David" once per turn.
1239189.name: Promising Knight, David

1240454.effect: During your turn, if you have 5 or more Level 3 monsters in your GY: You can Tribute this card; Special Summon 1 Level 3 monster from your Deck, in Defense Position. When this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can send 1 Level 3 monster from your Deck to the GY. You can only use this effect of "Blue Espada Dragon" once per turn.
1240454.name: Blue Espada Dragon

1241539.effect: If this card was sent from your hand or Deck to the GY: You can draw 1 card. When this card is Normal or Special Summoned: Send the top card of your Deck to the GY. You can only use this effect of "Black-winged Swordbreaker" once per turn.
1241539.name: Black-winged Swordbreaker

1243438.effect: This monster is treated as a Level 3 monster while in your GY. When this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can discard 1 card; draw 1 card. If a Level 3 monster was discarded by this effect: Gain 1000 LP. You can only use this effect of "Morion Spear Dragon" once per turn.
1243438.name: Morion Spear Dragon

1247612.effect: This card is treated as a Normal Monster while face-up on the field or in the GY. While this card is a Normal Monster on the field, you can Normal Summon it to have it become an Effect Monster with this effect.● This monster is treated as a Level 3 monster.
1247612.name: Darkpride Dragon
1247612.pendulum_effect: DARK Dragon Xyz monsters you control cannot be targeted by your opponent's card effects. You can target 1 Level 3 monster in your GY; send a monster with the same name as that target from your Deck to the GY. You can only use this effect of "Darkpride Dragon" once per turn.

1240538.effect: During the Main Phase: Target 1 Xyz Monster you control with no Xyz Materials; Special Summon from your Extra Deck, 1 Xyz Monster with the same Type and Attribute that is 1 Rank higher than that monster you control, by using it as the Xyz Material, and if you do, attach this card to it as additional Xyz Material. (This Special Summon is treated as an Xyz Summon.) During your turn: You can banish 3 Level 3 monsters in your GY; set this card to your field. You can only use each effect of "Transcendance Rank-Up-Magic Supremacy Extract" once per turn.
1240538.name: Transcendance Rank-Up-Magic Supremacy Extract

1237216.effect: 2 Level 3 monstersWhen this card is Xyz Summoned: You can excavate the top 3 cards of your Deck, send as many Level 3 monsters from among them to your GY, then shuffle the rest back to your Deck, and if you do, until the end of this turn, this card gains 500 ATK for each card sent to the GY this way. At the end of the battle it attacked, and if you have 7 or more Level 3 monsters in your GY, you can detach 1 material; this monster can declare a second attack this turn, but all battle damage from that battle is halved. You can only use each effect of "Claret Sword Dragon" once per turn.
1237216.name: Claret Sword Dragon

1241635.effect: 3 Level 4 monstersWhen this card is Xyz Summoned: You can excavate the top 3 cards of your Deck, and send as many Level 3 monsters from among them to your GY and shuffle the rest back to your Deck; until the end of this turn, this card gains 500 ATK for each card sent to the GY this way. If this monster has inflicted Battle Damage to your opponent, and if you have 10 or more Level 3 monsters in your GY, you can detach 1 material; Special Summon up to 3 Level 3 monsters from your Deck, with their effects negated. If this card has "Claret Sword Dragon" as an Xyz Material it gains the following effect:● If this monster would be destroyed by battle or card effect: You can banish 1 Level 3 monster from your GY instead.
1241635.name: Supremacy True Dragon, Claret Sword Helheim
1241635.treated_as: Supremacy True Dragon, Claret Sword Helheim

1239496.effect: 3 Level 4 DARK monstersWhen this card is Xyz Summoned: You can send up to 2 Level 3 monsters you control or from your hand to the GY. When this card attacks: You can detach 1 material from this card; reveal the top 2 cards of your Deck and add them to your hand. This monster gains 500 ATK/DEF for each Level 3 monster revealed by this effect until the end of this turn. You can only use each effect of "Supremacy Black Dragon, Aurageyser Dragon" once per turn.
1239496.name: Supremacy Black Dragon, Aurageyser Dragon

1241485.effect: 4 Level 5 DARK monstersWhen this card is Xyz Summoned: You can excavate the top 5 cards of your Deck; send all Level 3 monsters from among them to your GY, and shuffle the rest back to your Deck. You can detach 1 material from this card; reveal the top 2 cards of your Deck and add them to your hand. Target 1 card your opponent controls for each Level 3 monster revealed by this effect; destroy those targets. You can only use each effect of "Supremacy Black Dragon, Aurageyser Doomed" once per turn. If this card has "Supremacy Black Dragon, Aurageyser Dragon" as an Xyz Material it gains the following effect:● This monster inflicts piercing damage when it attacks an opponent's monster in Defense Position.
1241485.name: Supremacy Black Dragon, Aurageyser Doomed

857126.effect: If this card is added to your hand, except by drawing it: You can reveal this card and another Beast-Warrior monster in your hand, except "Heat Hound Beagleblast"; Special Summon them. You can only use this effect of "Heat Hound Beagleblast" once per turn. If this card is used as material for the Synchro Summon of a "Hell Hound" monster: You can target 1 "Heat Hound" monster in your GY, that wasn't used as Material for that Synchro Monster; Special Summon it in Defense Position.
857126.name: Heat Hound Beagleblast

857167.effect:
If this card is added to your hand, except by drawing it: You can reveal this card in your hand; Send 1 "Heat Hound" card from your Deck to your GY. You can only use this effect of "Heat Hound Charcoal Corgi" once per turn.
A Synchro Monster Summoned using this card as material gains the following effect.
*Once per turn, during the End Phase: You can target 1 "Heat Hound" monster in your GY; add it to your hand.
857167.name: Heat Hound Charcoal Corgi

857238.effect: If this card is Normal Summoned: You can add 1 "Heat Hound" monster from your Deck to your hand, except "Heat Hound Scintillating Shih-Tzu". If this card is added to your hand, except by drawing it: You can reveal this card in your hand; Target 1 card on the field, destroy it. You can only use each effect of "Heat Hound Scintillating Shih-Tzu" once per turn.
857238.name: Heat Hound Scintillating Shih-Tzu

857122.effect: If this card is added to your hand, except by drawing it: You can reveal this card in your hand; Add 1 "Heat Hound" card from your Deck to your hand, except "Heat Hound Tinder Terrier". You can only use this effect of "Heat Hound Tinder Terrier" once per turn. This card can attack directly, also it can attack twice during each Battle Phase.
857122.name: Heat Hound Tinder Terrier

857198.effect:
If this card is added to your hand, except by drawing it: You can reveal this card in your hand, then activate one of the following effects: 
*Special Summon this card.
*Target 1 "Heat Hound" monster you control; this turn, it can be treated as a Tuner or a non-Tuner for a Synchro Summon.
*Target 1 "Heat Hound" monster you control; this turn, if it attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing damage to your opponent. 
You can only use this effect of "Heat Hound Farenheit Foxhound" once per turn.
857198.name: Heat Hound Farenheit Foxhound

1815301.effect: You can send 1 FIRE Beast-Warrior monster from your hand or face-up field to the GY; Special Summon this card from your hand in Defense Position. If this card is added to your hand, except by drawing it: You can reveal this card, then target 1 "Heat Hound" monster in your GY, except "Heat Hound Burnin' Bernard" or a Synchro Monster; Special Summon it. You can only use each effect of "Heat Hound Burnin' Bernard" once per turn.
1815301.name: Heat Hound Burnin' Bernard

859293.effect: You can discard 1 "Heat Hound" card, then target 1 "Heat Hound" monster you control; It cannot be destroyed or targeted by card effects until the end of the next turn. During the End Phase, if you activated this effect this turn; You can Set 1 "Heat Hound" Spell/ Trap from your GY. You can only use each effect of "Heat Hound's Charred ChargeCharge" once per turn.
859293.name: Heat Hound's Charred Charge

857220.effect: Target 1 FIRE Tuner monster you control; Immediately after this effect resolves, Synchro Summon 1 "Heat Hound" monster from your Extra Deck, by using monsters you control, including the targeted monster, as material. If a "Heat Hound" card was added to your hand this turn, except by drawing it, you can also use monsters in your hand as Synchro Material. You can only activate 1 "Heat Hound's Extinguishing" per turn.
857220.name: Heat Hound's Extinguishing

857119.effect: Add 1 "Heat Hound" monster from your Deck to your hand, or, if you control a "Heat Hound" Synchro Monster, you can add 1 FIRE monster with 200 or less DEF instead.
857119.name: Heat Hound's Grilling Game

857156.effect: Once per turn, if exactly 1 monster is Summoned: That monster's controller can add 1 monster with the same Attribute and 200 or less DEF from their Deck to their hand. Once per turn, if you Synchro Summon a Beast-Warrior Synchro Monster: You can add 1 "Heat Hound" Spell/Trap from your Deck to your hand, then your opponent draws 1 card. If a Beast-Warrior monster(s) you control would be destroyed by battle or card effect, you can banish this card from your GY instead.
857156.name: Heat Hound's Hot House

857140.effect: Target 1 "Heat Hound" monster in your GY and 1 monster in your opponent's GY: Shuffle both targets into the Deck, then add 1 monster from your Deck to your hand, whose name is the same as either of the targeted monsters'. If a "Heat Hound" card was added to your hand this turn, except by drawing it, you can activate this card from your hand.
857140.name: Heat Hound's Reignition

857502.effect: When a "Heat Hound" monster(s) you control is destroyed by battle or card effect: You can add 1 "Heat Hound" card from your Deck to your hand. You can send this face-up card you control to the GY and discard 1 "Heat Hound" monster; send 1 face-up Spell/Trap your opponent controls to the GY. You can only use 1 effect of "Heat Hound's Call" per turn, and only once that turn.
857502.name: Heat Hound's Call

857186.effect:
1 "Heat Hound" Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner FIRE monsters
If this card is Synchro Summoned: You can target up to 2 monsters with 200 or less Def in your GY; Special Summon them in Defense Position, also you cannot Special Summon monsters for the rest of the turn, except FIRE monsters. You can only use this effect of "Heat Hound Bonfire Boxer" once per turn. "Heat Hound" monsters you control cannot be destroyed by battle. Whenever you add a "Heat Hound" card to your hand, except during the Draw Phase: All "Heat Hound" monsters you control gains 300 ATK.
857186.name: Heat Hound Bonfire Boxer

857332.effect:
1 FIRE Tuner + 1+ FIRE non-Tuner Monsters
When this card is Special Summoned: You can target 3 "Heat Hound" cards in your GY; shuffle them into the Deck, then you can add the top of your Deck to your hand.. Up to twice per turn, when a "Heat Hound" monster you control battles (Quick Effect): You can reveal any number of FIRE Beast-Warrior monsters in your hand; Your battling monster gains 600 ATK for each monster revealed, until the end of this turn. "Heat Hound" monsters you control cannot be destroyed by card effects.
857332.name: Heat Hound Sizzling Shiba

857135.effect:
1 FIRE Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters
When this card is Synchro Summoned: You can discard 1 FIRE monster, and if you do, add 1 "Heat Hound" monster from your Deck to your hand. If this card is sent to the GY as Synchro Material: You can Special Summon 1 "Heat Hound" monster from your hand. You can only use each effect of "Heat Hound Pyro Poodle" once per turn.
857135.name: Heat Hound Pyro Poodle

857587.effect: 1 "Heat Hound" Tuner + 1+ FIRE Beast-Warrior non-Tuner MonstersMust first be Synchro Summoned. If this card is Synchro Summoned: You can add up to 3 "Heat Hound" monsters with different names and Levels from your GY to your hand as possible. Your "Heat Hound" monsters cannot be targeted by card effects. You have no hand limit. Up to twice per turn (Quick Effect): You can reveal 1 "Heat Hound" monster in your hand, then target 1 card on the field, destroy it.
857587.name: Heat Hound Cinder Chihuahua

1815786.effect:
1 non-Link Beast-Warrior monster
Cannot be destroyed by battle. If this card is Link Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 Level 3 Beast-Warrior monster from your hand. During the Main or Battle Phase (Quick Effect): You can Tribute this card; immediately after this effect resolves, Synchro Summon 1 FIRE Synchro Monster from your Extra Deck, using monsters you control and up to 1 Beast-Warrior monster in your hand as Synchro Material. That Summoned monster cannot be destroyed by battle for the rest of this turn. You can only use each effect of "Heat Hound Blazin' Bichon" once per turn.
1815786.name: Heat Hound Blazin' Bichon
